20101230030124.000|20101230030125.000|CC1|TO DESTRUCTIVE STREET GANGS,    
20101230030125.000|20101230030129.000|CC1|IT'S A DANGEROUS MIX.           
20101230030129.000|20101230030130.000|CC1|>> BULLDOGS ARE AT WAR WITH

20101230030132.000|20101230030134.000|CC1|MEMBERS INTO THE SHOE WHERE THEY
20101230030134.000|20101230030134.000|CC1|HAVE A CHOICE, STAY IN THE GANG 
20101230030134.000|20101230030137.000|CC1|OR DROP OUT.                    
20101230030137.000|20101230030138.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE GOING TO HAVE TO DIE  
20101230030138.000|20101230030139.000|CC1|SOMETIME.                       
20101230030139.000|20101230030144.000|CC1|I MIGHT AS WELL GO OUT WITH A   
20101230030144.000|20101230030158.000|CC1|BANG.                           
20101230030158.000|20101230030201.000|CC1|>> CALIFORNIA STATE PRISON      
20101230030201.000|20101230030204.000|CC1|CORCORAN HAS THE LARGEST HOUSING
20101230030204.000|20101230030206.000|CC1|UNIT OR SHOE IN THE STATE.      
20101230030206.000|20101230030208.000|CC1|SPLIT BETWEEN TWO UNITS, THE    
20101230030208.000|20101230030211.000|CC1|SHOE HOUSES SOME OF THE WORST   
20101230030211.000|20101230030211.000|CC1|INMATES IN CALIFORNIA.          
20101230030211.000|20101230030214.000|CC1|THE MAJORITY OF THESE ARE       
20101230030214.000|20101230030216.000|CC1|VALIDATED GANG MEMBERS OR       
20101230030216.000|20101230030218.000|CC1|INMATES TOO VIOLENT TO BE HOUSED
20101230030218.000|20101230030219.000|CC1|IN THE GENERAL POPULATION.      
20101230030219.000|20101230030223.000|CC1|SHOE INMATES ARE KEPT IN 8x12   
20101230030223.000|20101230030226.000|CC1|FOOT CELLS AND RECEIVE ONLY 10  
20101230030226.000|20101230030228.000|CC1|HOURS OF REC TIME EACH WEEK.    
20101230030228.000|20101230030230.000|CC1|WHEN MOVED, THEY ARE SHACKLED   
20101230030230.000|20101230030232.000|CC1|AND ESCORTED BY TWO OFFICERS AT 
20101230030232.000|20101230030235.000|CC1|ALL TIMES.                      
20101230030235.000|20101230030236.000|CC1|AWARENESS IS VITAL.             
20101230030236.000|20101230030239.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE TO WEAR THESE HARD   
20101230030239.000|20101230030242.000|CC1|SHIELDS FOR THE PURPOSE OF THE  
20101230030242.000|20101230030244.000|CC1|INMATES ON THE TIER LIKE TO     
20101230030244.000|20101230030246.000|CC1|SHOOT ITEMS SUCH AS PINS,       
20101230030246.000|20101230030247.000|CC1|NEEDLES, ANY TYPE OF WEAPON.    
20101230030247.000|20101230030251.000|CC1|THEY LIKE TO SOAK IT IN FECES,  
20101230030251.000|20101230030253.000|CC1|URINE, SHOOT IT AT US.          
20101230030253.000|20101230030254.000|CC1|TRY TO GET US IN THE FACE.      
20101230030254.000|20101230030259.000|CC1|WE HAVE A MEXICAN MAFIA, WE HAVE
20101230030259.000|20101230030303.000|CC1|THE NORTHERN STRUCTURE, THE     
20101230030303.000|20101230030306.000|CC1|ARIAN BROTHERHOOD AND NAZI LOW  
20101230030306.000|20101230030306.000|CC1|RIDER.                          
20101230030306.000|20101230030307.000|CC1|THESE GUYS ARE HERE BECAUSE OF  
20101230030307.000|20101230030309.000|CC1|THEIR CRIMINAL ACTIVITY.        
20101230030309.000|20101230030313.000|CC1|IT'S EITHER DRUG RELATED,       
20101230030313.000|20101230030317.000|CC1|ASSAULTS ON STAFF ASSAULTS ON   
20101230030317.000|20101230030318.000|CC1|OTHER INMATES.                  
20101230030318.000|20101230030319.000|CC1|WE DO HOUSE THE WORST OF THE    
20101230030319.000|20101230030321.000|CC1|WORST HERE, SECURITY IS         
20101230030321.000|20101230030321.000|CC1|PARAMOUNT.                      
20101230030321.000|20101230030323.000|CC1|WHILE YOU'VE BEEN VALIDATED AS A
20101230030323.000|20101230030324.000|CC1|GANG MEMBER, YOU'RE GOING TO    
20101230030324.000|20101230030328.000|CC1|REMAIN IN SHOE.                 
20101230030328.000|20101230030334.000|CC1|>> ONE OF THE MOST DANGEROUS    
20101230030334.000|20101230030336.000|CC1|INMATES IN THE SHOE IS A CHILD  
20101230030336.000|20101230030342.000|CC1|WHO WAS MADE TO LEAD THE MEXICAN
20101230030342.000|20101230030343.000|CC1|MAFIA.                          
20101230030343.000|20101230030347.000|CC1|HE IS SHACKLED BY TWO OFFICERS, 
20101230030347.000|20101230030355.000|CC1|THEY INSISTED OUR STAFF WEAR    
20101230030355.000|20101230030400.000|CC1|PUNCTURE RESISTANT PROTECTION.  
20101230030400.000|20101230030402.000|CC1|>> I'M GERMAN MEXICAN, BUT MY   
20101230030402.000|20101230030403.000|CC1|HEART'S ALWAYS BEEN BROWN.      
20101230030403.000|20101230030407.000|CC1|I WAS IN L.A. COUNTY JAIL FOR   
20101230030407.000|20101230030408.000|CC1|3.5 YEARS.                      
20101230030408.000|20101230030411.000|CC1|THEY PUT ME ON TRIAL FOR        
20101230030411.000|20101230030413.000|CC1|MURDER/ROBBERY AND POSSESSION OF
20101230030413.000|20101230030413.000|CC1|HEROIN.                         
20101230030413.000|20101230030415.000|CC1|WHETHER I WAS INNOCENT OR NOT,  
20101230030415.000|20101230030415.000|CC1|JUST BY LOOKING AT ME, I WAS    
20101230030415.000|20101230030420.000|CC1|GUILTY.                         
20101230030420.000|20101230030422.000|CC1|AND I WAS PISSED.               
20101230030422.000|20101230030425.000|CC1|THERE WAS NO WAY I WAS GOING TO 
20101230030425.000|20101230030428.000|CC1|LET THE SYSTEM GIVE ME LIFE IN  
20101230030428.000|20101230030430.000|CC1|PRISON UNLESS I EARNED IT.      
20101230030430.000|20101230030432.000|CC1|SO -- OH, I OWNED IT ALL RIGHT. 
20101230030432.000|20101230030438.000|CC1|>> WE LISTENED TO TAPES OF A    
20101230030438.000|20101230030441.000|CC1|JAILHOUSE ADMISSION TO A MURDER 
20101230030441.000|20101230030443.000|CC1|CHRISTIAN COMMITTED.            
20101230030443.000|20101230030444.000|CC1|>> IT WAS AN INDIVIDUAL FROM MY 
20101230030444.000|20101230030445.000|CC1|AREA.                           
20101230030445.000|20101230030450.000|CC1|HE HAD PUT HIMSELF IN THE WRONG 
20101230030450.000|20101230030456.000|CC1|POSITION BY -- IF I'M GOING TO  
20101230030456.000|20101230030458.000|CC1|GET LIFE FOR A MURDER/ROBBERY ON
20101230030458.000|20101230030500.000|CC1|THE STREETS, AND I'M IN HERE.   
20101230030500.000|20101230030501.000|CC1|I'M SURE GOING TO MAKE SURE IT'S
20101230030501.000|20101230030503.000|CC1|GOING TO TAKE ME SOMEWHERE.     
20101230030503.000|20101230030506.000|CC1|A POLITICAL HIT LIKE THAT, YOU  
20101230030506.000|20101230030508.000|CC1|KNOW, THAT HAS JUICE BEHIND IT. 
20101230030508.000|20101230030510.000|CC1|AT THE SAME TIME, IF I'M GOING  
20101230030510.000|20101230030511.000|CC1|TO DO SOMETHING, I'M GOING TO DO
20101230030511.000|20101230030513.000|CC1|IT TO THE EXTREME.              
20101230030513.000|20101230030516.000|CC1|I INVITE THE INDIVIDUAL IN, I   
20101230030516.000|20101230030518.000|CC1|HAVE A PRETENSE OF HEY, I WANT  
20101230030518.000|20101230030519.000|CC1|TO GET HIGH.                    
20101230030519.000|20101230030521.000|CC1|HE CAME INSIDE THE PAD, SHOT    
20101230030521.000|20101230030521.000|CC1|DOPE.                           
20101230030521.000|20101230030525.000|CC1|I WALK UP TO HIM, HOOK HIS LEG. 
20101230030525.000|20101230030530.000|CC1|THROW HIM IN A BARE NAKED CHOKE 
20101230030530.000|20101230030533.000|CC1|HOLD, BRING HIM DOWN, CHOKE HIM 
20101230030533.000|20101230030535.000|CC1|OUT AND SNAP HIS NECK.          
20101230030535.000|20101230030537.000|CC1|WHEN HIS NECK SNAPPED YOU FEEL  
20101230030537.000|20101230030538.000|CC1|IT HERE, POP.                   
20101230030538.000|20101230030541.000|CC1|I PULLED OUT MY PIECE, STABBED  
20101230030541.000|20101230030543.000|CC1|HIM IN THE NECK, LET HIM HAVE IT
20101230030543.000|20101230030545.000|CC1|IN THE CHEST AND HE STARTED

20101230030546.000|20101230030550.000|CC1|AND I PULLED OUT A PIPE AND     
20101230030550.000|20101230030552.000|CC1|BASHED HIS HEAD IN, UNTIL A     
20101230030552.000|20101230030555.000|CC1|PIECE OF HIS SKULL CAME OUT.    
20101230030555.000|20101230030558.000|CC1|SO THE BLOOD WAS EVERYWHERE, IT 
20101230030558.000|20101230030600.000|CC1|WAS LIKE THIS THICK.            
20101230030600.000|20101230030602.000|CC1|WENT AHEAD AND SCOOPED IT UP,   
20101230030602.000|20101230030605.000|CC1|PUT IT IN THE TOILET, FLUSH IT, 
20101230030605.000|20101230030607.000|CC1|PUT HIM UNDER THE BUNK.

20101230031300.000|20101230031302.000|CC1|VIOLATIONS.                     
20101230031302.000|20101230031303.000|CC1|CORCORAN'S GANG POPULATION HAS  
20101230031303.000|20101230031305.000|CC1|GROWN SO LARGE THAT EVEN A LEVEL
